name: Daniel Toman
body:
### Who is this guy?
I'm a designer/builder in a digital world. I've worked on creative projects for short films, music festivals, iPad magazines, arts organizations, nonprofits, alt weekly newspapers, fashion designers, gardeners, authors, dieticians and dive bars. I'm currently freelancing â€” [get in touch](mailto:daniel.toman@gmail.com)!

### Stuff I dig
* responsive design
* user experience
* mobile apps
* information design
* CSS  /  JavaScript  /  jQuery
* Drupal  /  Drupal Gardens  /  Pantheon
* Wordpress  /  Wordpress.com

### Where to find me
* Email: [daniel.toman@gmail.com](mailto:daniel.toman@gmail.com) 
* Skype: atonaldenim 
* Twitter: [atonaldenim](https://twitter.com/atonaldenim)  /  [501cGeek](https://twitter.com/501cGeek) 
* GitHub: [daniel-toman](https://github.com/daniel-toman) 
* Drupal.org: [501cGeek](https://drupal.org/user/759272) 

### Some things I've made
[Daniel Toman's portfolio](http://portfolio.danieltoman.com)  /  [portfolio.danieltoman.com](http://portfolio.danieltoman.com)

### Things I go to
OSCON  /  DrupalCon  /  NTC  /  Hacks/Hackers  /  CreativeMornings
